job_purpose: To design and build API driven test frameworks, develop automation scripts, and ensure high-quality releases in an Agile/Scrum environment.
job_duties_and_responsibilities: Design and build API driven test frameworks
Create and execute automation scripts for System Test, Integration test, Progression, Regression
Prepare and write Test Plans and Test Scripts
Perform Regression Testing, UI Testing, API Testing using automation
Develop Automation Feasibility Matrix based on requirements
Link business requirements with Test Cases and defects
Raise defects based on failures in Automation Test Reports
Provide consultation on automation testing tools
Provide advice on software design activities
Work closely with developers and product teams to ensure high-quality releases

Excellent oral and written communication skills
